promptPrefix:
Please review the following writing.  Next, think about the tone, style, and any other characteristics of the writing sample.  Then, list a description of the writing style, tone, and other characteristics.  Do all of this in a step-by-step way, showing your work for each step, and explaining your reasoning (in  [TARGETLANGUAGE]).

Here's the writing sample:

[PROMPT]
title: Writing-Style Characterizer
